title: On the offensive – Seeking a new edge, buy-side invests in portfolio and risk analytics
description: A fast-moving, headstrong hedge fund – hit by rare losses after a black swan event touched on an overweight country exposure – ponders adding fresh quantitative expertise. Much to traders’ chagrin, the chief investment officer and chief operating officer recruit several quants, running them through the gauntlet and backtesting their behavioural algorithms, before eventually deciding to take on the project themselves
